Batman Begins.Plot: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from the corruption that Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.
Batman Begins.Writer: Bob Kane (characters), David S. Goyer (story), Christopher Nolan (screenplay), David S. Goyer (screenplay)
Batman Begins.Title: Batman Begins
Batman Begins.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 14 wins & 68 nominations.
Batman Begins.Actors: Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Liam Neeson, Katie Holmes

Moneyball.Plot: Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to assemble a baseball team on a lean budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.
Moneyball.Writer: Steven Zaillian (screenplay), Aaron Sorkin (screenplay), Stan Chervin (story), Michael Lewis (book)
Moneyball.Title: Moneyball
Moneyball.Awards: Nominated for 6 Oscars. Another 29 wins & 74 nominations.
Moneyball.Actors: Brad Pitt, Jonah Hill, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Robin Wright

Finding Nemo.Plot: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.
Finding Nemo.Writer: Andrew Stanton (original story by), Andrew Stanton (screenplay), Bob Peterson (screenplay), David Reynolds (screenplay)
Finding Nemo.Title: Finding Nemo
Finding Nemo.Actors: Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould, Willem Dafoe

National Treasure.Plot: A historian races to find the legendary Templar Treasure before a team of mercenaries.
National Treasure.Writer: Jim Kouf (screenplay), Cormac Wibberley (screenplay), Marianne Wibberley (screenplay), Jim Kouf (story), Oren Aviv (story), Charles Segars (story)
National Treasure.Title: National Treasure
National Treasure.Actors: Nicolas Cage, Diane Kruger, Justin Bartha, Sean Bean

21.Plot: "21" is the fact-based story about six MIT students who were trained to become experts in card counting and subsequently took Vegas casinos for millions in winnings.
21.Writer: Peter Steinfeld (screenplay), Allan Loeb (screenplay), Ben Mezrich (book)
21.Actors: Jim Sturgess, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth, Aaron Yoo

King Kong.Plot: A movie crew, travelling to a mysterious island to shoot their picture, encounter a furious gorilla, taking their leading actress and forming a special relationship with her, protecting her at all costs.
King Kong.Writer: Fran Walsh (screenplay), Philippa Boyens (screenplay), Peter Jackson (screenplay), Merian C. Cooper (based on a story by), Edgar Wallace (based on a story by)
King Kong.Title: King Kong
King Kong.Actors: Naomi Watts, Jack Black, Adrien Brody, Thomas Kretschmann
